name: BRITEWOOD® XL SAPSTAIN CONTROL
description: BRITEWOOD® XL SAPSTAIN CONTROL deliver high quality, bright, clean lumber. For more than 20 years, BRITEWOOD XL has protected fresh-cut hardwood and softwood lumber from damaging mold and fungi growth. BRITEWOOD XL is a broad-spectrum fungicide that is easily applied to freshly cut lumber by dipping or in spray box application. It quickly penetrates and binds to wood, allowing for a more uniform distribution throughout the lumber.
